thread.title: Sherry Riels jones
thread.title_full: MC Donalds reviewed by Sherry Riels jones

author: Sherry Riels jones
title: Sherry Riels jones
text:
How was your customer services at a restaurant you visit. And name the restaurant you eat food there.
Well my visit at red lobster was offer.
The food was not right.
The food was cold.
I had to wait a long period of time.
My waitress had a bad attuide.
I was dog on mad.
What about your experience.
Don't hold back it could help some body some one get a job baby.
Real talk
DO NOT FORGET TO MAKE REVIEW PAGE USEFUL FOR VOICE OPINIONS
I KNOW I DID.
